name: Shroom Surprise
description:
2D platformer in which you control a mushroom who must unlock the door to reach the next level.  Now if only you knew which switch unlocked the door...

Made during Weekly Game Jam #35  -  Theme:  "What's It Do?"

Code:  Josh Gunn - gunner2.itch.io

Art:  Jack Pressnell - somefarang.itch.io

Controls:

Move = W,A,S,D

Jump = Space

Activate = Left Mouse
